sentences.sentence: The racist comments chanted at Real Madrid player Vinicius Junior last month have given an insight into the progress that still needs to be made in stadiums all around the globe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: With racism, it's not something that happens very often, but every time it happens, it sort of knocks you back and floors you because just when you think everything's OK, it's a reminder that it's not.
